thread.title: CeeLo Green is sorry and wants to return to The Voice
thread.title_full: CeeLo Green is sorry and wants to return to The Voice

title: CeeLo Green is sorry and wants to return to The Voice
text:
CeeLo Green is sorry and wants to return to 'The Voice' 
Fox News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
CeeLo Green says he's sorry and wants back on "The Voice." 
"I've talked very possibly about doing 'The Voice' again," Green said in an interview with the Associated Press Wednesday. "So I just kind of put that out there, wishful thinking, kind of willing it. Because I would love to do it again." 
Green served as an original coach when the reality competition show premiered in 2011. He left last year after facing charges in a felony drug case. He pleaded no contest to giving a woman ecstasy at a 2012 dinner and recently completed his sentenced community service and remains on probation...
